channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Prelude
item.description: I finally made my first website (with templates and guidelines). I hope to write about algorithms I studied or am going to research on. My research focuses on image reconstruction for biomedical and astronomical imaging through optimisation algorithms and deep learning. I am interested in photography, gaming, music and travelling. Through this website, I want to research on algorithms that would help me improve image quality of the photos I take, such as denoising and deblurring.
